## Features

SkillMeat provides comprehensive artifact management with powerful organization, deployment, and sync capabilities.

{{> feature-grid}}

**Key Capabilities:**

- Organize artifacts into named collections for better project separation
- Import from any GitHub repository with automatic scanning
- Deploy artifacts to projects with scope management (user/local)
- Track deployments with real-time status and drift detection
- Bidirectional sync with conflict resolution and merge strategies
- Browse marketplace listings and publish your own bundles
- Manage MCP servers, context entities, and templates
- Analytics and usage tracking for optimization
- Version history with snapshots and rollback support
- Secure vault for credentials and sensitive configuration
